reviews.title: Best in class Slack solution
reviews.review: After trying several alternatives, Slack stands out for its reliability and comprehensive feature set. The mobile app works flawlessly and the uptime has been perfect.

reviews.title: Good but has some limitations
reviews.review: Overall Slack is good for basic use cases. However, we encountered some limitations with advanced reporting features. Hope they improve this in future updates. Customer support was helpful though.

reviews.title: Solid solution with great features
reviews.review: Slack offers all the features we need at a reasonable price. The integration with other tools was seamless and our team adapted quickly. The mobile app is particularly well-designed.

reviews.title: Excellent Slack for our team workflow
reviews.review: We've been using Slack for over a year and it has significantly improved our team collaboration. The interface is intuitive and the customer support is responsive. Would highly recommend to other teams.
